description: Luffy infiltrates the world's greatest prison, Impel Down, to rescue his brother Ace before his execution. This episode is part of the arc where Luffy has been poisoned by Magellan and is being helped by Bentham to find Emporio Ivankov.
significance: Episode 438 marks a turning point in the arc where Luffy finds hope through Ivankov's potential cure, and introduces key Revolutionary Army members who will aid in the prison break.
